info.title: Tilkee
info.description: Tilkee is an online platform that makes cross-functional collaboration happen. Combining deep knowledge of sales enablement with augmented intelligence, the vision of the team behind Tilkee is to align marketing with sales and guide Sales, Product Marketing, Channel Enablement, and Customer Success teams towards digital transformation.

url.title: Project url (available only with Marketing option

post.summary: Create a project, add document(s) and retrieve access link(s)

id.title: Original project id
id.description: Id of an existing project that will be duplicated

can_be_downloaded.title: Downloadable?
can_be_downloaded.description: TRUE if the documents can be downloaded

consultable.title: Consultable?
consultable.description: TRUE if the project is consultable

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags to add to this project (array of string(s))

collaborators.title: Collaborators (Ids)
collaborators.description: Collaborators to add to this project (array of id(s))

is_template.title: Template?
is_template.description: TRUE if this project will be used as a template

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme (logo/colors) to be used for this project

documents.title: Documents

s3_url.title: Document URL
s3_url.description: Accessible URL of the document. This URL is retrieved after posting a file using ITEMS route OR by providing a public whitelisted URL, with from_url=TRUE

content.title: Base64 encoded content
content.description: Base64 encoded content - must include MIME : data:file/pdf;base64,

signable.title: Signable?
signable.description: TRUE if the document can be signed - used ONLY with PDF files

from_url.title: From external URL?
from_url.description: TRUE if Document URL is external to Tilkee

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: ID of the contact in your system

name.description: Name of the unique generated link

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: ID of the contact in your system

external_data.title: Misc information
external_data.description: Specific information to be added in case of eSignature and form PDFs

post.description: Create a project, add document(s) and retrieve access link(s) from this endpoint

get.summary: List and search projects or templates
get.description: List or search for project or template

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sorting order (-created_at to order by creation date desc)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Add tags (coma separated) to search projects

parameters.name: tagOperator
parameters.description: Use AND (default) to retrieve projects with all tags, OR to retrieve projects with any of the provided tags

parameters.name: is_owner
parameters.description: TRUE to retrieve only my projects (no projects from other users)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for any text in project's or link's name

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Tilkee internal id of the project to update

can_be_downloaded.title: Downloadable?
can_be_downloaded.description: TRUE if the documents can be downloaded

consultable.title: Consultable?
consultable.description: TRUE if the project if consultable

duration.title: Duration (for templates only)
duration.description: Used only for templates, you can create projects from this template that will expire xx days later.

starred.title: Starred?
starred.description: TRUE if is a starred project

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags to add to this project (array of string(s))

collaborators.title: Collaborators (Ids)
collaborators.description: Collaborators to add to this project (array of id(s))

is_template.title: Template?
is_template.description: TRUE if this project will be used as a template

vcard_id.title: vCard
vcard_id.description: ID of the vCard to be displayed

email_cible.title: Notification email
email_cible.description: Other notification email (only for Marketing projects)

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme (logo/colors) to be used for this project

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Tilkee internal id of the project to add links to

post.summary: Add item(s) to a specific project
post.description: Add one or mutiple items to a specific project

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Tilkee internal id of the project to add documents to

downloadable.title: Downloadable?
downloadable.description: TRUE if the document can be downloaded

items.description: Documents to add to the project. Must be items, created using Tilkee'API
items.title: Documents

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Add tags (coma separated) to search items

parameters.name: tagOperator
parameters.description: Use AND (default) to retrieve items with all tags, OR to retrieve items with any of the provided tags

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for any text in document's name

post.description: Create a new item before adding it to a project

url.title: iFrame URL (when type=link)
url.description: Accessible URL, which will be displayed in an iFrame

s3_url.title: Document URL (when type=file)
s3_url.description: Accessible URL of the document. This URL is retrieved after posting a file using ITEMS route

content.title: Text content (when type=text)
content.description: Any HTML content that will be displayed in viewer

title.title: Document name
title.description: To be used with TEXT and LINK items only

name.title: File name
name.description: To be used with FILE items only

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: ID of the contact in your system

get.description: Retrieve S3 upload information to upload file in Tilkee's platform. After retrieving this info, you should POST your file to 's3_endpoint, with key, acl, policy, signature & AWSAccessKeyId parameters. Amazon’s response is the URL you need to create your item in Tilkee.

parameters.name: check_existing
parameters.description: Check existing files with sames name?

post.description: Trigger your Flow when this event is triggered in Tilkee

rule.title: Any of connexion_started, connexion_ended, token_signed, token_created, project_archived, unactivated_project_accessed, user_created

user_id.description: Only send notifications for this user's projects

project_id.description: Only send notifications for this projects
